system.novice: Navigator can use Perception Characteristic in place of their Weapon Skill and/or Ballistic Skill Characteristics for the purposes of Tests. Lasts until the end of their next turn, +1 turn per Degree of Success.
system.adept: Navigator's Melee and Ranged Attacks impose -10 to Dodge and Parry Tests made by opponents to avoid them.
system.master: Navigator's Melee and Ranged Attacks instead impose -20 to Dodge and Parry Tests made by opponents to avoid them. As opposed to -10.
